SHORTURL_SEARCH_WHERE.Statement: WHERE shop_id = @shop_id AND CASE WHEN short_url LIKE '%:%' THEN short_url ELSE @protocol_and_domain + short_url END LIKE '%' + @short_url_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#' AND CASE WHEN long_url LIKE '%:%' THEN long_url ELSE @protocol_and_domain + long_url END LIKE '%' + @long_url_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#'

SHORTURL_SEARCH_ORDER_BY.Statement: ORDER BY CASE @sort_kbn WHEN 0 THEN date_created ELSE NULL END ASC, CASE @sort_kbn WHEN 2 THEN short_url ELSE '1' END ASC, CASE @sort_kbn WHEN 1 THEN date_created ELSE NULL END DESC, -- 常に一定の結果セットを得るため、主キー（昇順）ソート surl_no ASC
